text.tspan: Vicious {1TP} - Attack Checks that result in
you can choose to make two separate
Attack Checks instead with a -2 penalty
Intimidating (AW) [NA] {1Presence} - Make a Contested Simplified Skill
Check using Intimidate against one Character that can Perceive you. On
Any Success that Character is Frightened for two Rounds, on Any Failure
they are Frightened for one Round
Reposition (AW) [RE] {1Cleverness} - When you get any Success with an
Attack Check you may move 2 Spaces, this Movement ignores any sources
of Difficult Movement and does not provoke Opportunity Attacks
Onslaught (1E) [NA] {1Physique} - Perform the Attack! Action at no Cost
First To Act (PA) - After determining which Character will go first in
Initiative for a Round you may choose to go first instead. You Suffer 1 Drain
Exploit Vulnerability (PA) - Whenever you make any Check against a
Character with at least two unique Detrimental Conditions you receive a +1
Combat Expert (PA) - All your Combat Techniques have 1 additional
Skillful (PA) - You gain three Skill Increases
Hunter (PA) - When making an Attack or Skill Checks against an Opponent
who is not within 2 Spaces of another Opponent you gain +1 Bonus to that
Check. Additionally, Attack Checks that meet this requirement Inflict 1
Bow Before Me! (PA) - Attack Checks you make that were Exerted and
result in any Success Inflict the Frightened Condition until the end of the
